name: searX Colors Inversion: oscar Pointhi
description: Colors inversion for Searx metasearch engine. It should work for all Searx public servers. Please write a comment if you feel something can be improved, I'd be glad to try any suggestion or to add more Searx public servers ^^
additional_info: Will look good only if used with the Oscar Pointhi Searx theme. If it doesn't look as expected just go to Preferences > Themes, select oscar theme and Pointhi style in the drop-down menus, then Save at the bottom. Will work on any Searx public server, such as searx.me, searx.de, searx.info, searx.laquadrature.net, searx.oe5tpo.com, seeks.hsbp.org, searx.brihx.fr, search.kujiu.org, searx.new-admin.net, search.homecomputing.fr, searx.potato.hu, s3arch.eu, search.jpope.org, searx.fossencdi.org, blackholeroutercondition.com, ready.pm, searx.schrodinger.io, search.blackit.de, heraut.eu/search, searx.aquilenet.fr, search.azkware.net, searx.netzspielplatz.de, searx.32bitflo.at, searx.nulltime.net, posativ.org/search, quackquackgo.nl/search, suche.elaon.de, search.koehn.com, search.notoriousdev.com, searx.4ray.co, iguana.cubeclan.ch/searx... Updated: fixed thumbnails layout, thumbnails inverted colors, zoom pop-up's position and text color, added a grey background behind right-colum image to make it more visible when the image is dark (to avoid dark on black).
